name: Totally Accurate Chicken Simulator
description:
A tiny game about feeding chickens

Controls

Left click - Place corn

WASD or Arrows - Move

E - Interact

F - Toggle fullscreen

Esc - Exit

Cheat codes

I - For Infinite corn

CREDITS

A game by: Ernesto Torres

Music: Up to the New (ID 1310) by Lobo Loco

https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Lobo_Loco/aa-sea/up-to-the-new-id-1310

Made for Godot Wild Jam #32

Known issues

Mac

- Godot game engine mouse capture doesn't work and the cursor points to the wrong place. 

Workaround:

Mac v1.0.1

makes the cursor visible, but the crosshair will not work properly. Run the game in Fullscreen mode and is recommended to press "i" for infinite corn mode, since the storage unit won't work properly without mouse capture.

Mac v1.0.3

Was able to build the Mac version with Godot 3.2.4_rc5 and works well in window mode, but cursor breaks again in fullscreen. If using mac, play in window mode.
